seo: Couchdb,批量检测,未授权访问,垂直越权,cve-2017-12635
summary: 该插件用于批量检测Couchdb的未授权访问漏洞（couchdb-unauth）和CVE-2017-12635垂直越权漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求来判断目标是否存在相关漏洞
summary_en: This plugin is used for batch detection of unauthorized access vulnerabilities (couchdb-unauth) and CVE-2017-12635 vertical privilege escalation vulnerabilities in Couchdb. It determines whether the target has related vulnerabilities by sending specific HTTP requests.
